list_definition.definition: (of type) thick and clear, like this

list_ex_of_english: Location of the gelatin and heparin-binding fragments which were used in the attachment assays, are in bold.
This used for the self-ratings a large (216r 279 mm) visual aid with lettering in a large (20 pt) bold font and two-step instructions.
Matrices and sets in the current paper are designated by bold letters.
The figures in parentheses indicate the tenures of employment (the bold lines) expressed in months.
The most important addition is the insertion of short highlights and conclusions in bold letters throughout the text, on almost every page.
Locations identified in bold type used the same tillage in the cropping system (other than no till).
Only the attended-speech condition matches the normal ogive (bold solid line).
Several patterns are shown in (22), where deviant brackets are in bold.
